name: Island Nation Builder
description:
A relaxing game where you build on islands!

You and you friends come out of school but to your horror you can't play video games! You must instead play the first board game you find, luckily its Island Nation Builder.

Developed by Michel440 and DeeDev

https://david-dee.itch.io/  -          https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM6cegKF8CT22MGU2IE5B1Q/featured

https://itch.io/profile/michel440
